TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFileExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFileExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

span.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类只包含扩展 和 类的静态方法。The class contains only static methods that extend the and classes. 不创建 类的实例;相反，请从 或 的实例使用这些方法。You do not create an instance of the class; instead, you use these methods from instances of or . 若要使用扩展方法，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the extension methods, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序中不可用。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 因此， 和 类（两者都在 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集中）在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序中不可用。Therefore, the and classes (both of which are in the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly) are not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序中，可以使用 、、和 中的方法来处理压缩的文件。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you work with compressed files by using the methods in , , , and . 类包含用于扩展 的四个方法：The class contains four methods that extend : - - - - 类包含扩展 的两个方法：The class contains two methods that extend : - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有文件在 zip 存档中创建新条目，并将存档内容提取到目录中。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the contents of the archive to a directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 zip 存档的内容并提取扩展名为 .txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存档中的新条目包含 `sourceFileName`指定的文件的内容。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称（`entryName`）的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 该项的 属性设置为上次更改文件系统上的文件的时间。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 如果 `ZipArchiveMode.Update` 存在，则项的大小限制仅限于 。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 此限制是因为更新模式在内部使用 以允许在更新存档时所需的查找，并且 的最大大小等于 int 的大小。This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有文件在 zip 存档中创建新条目。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存档中的新条目包含 `sourceFileName`指定的文件的内容。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称（`entryName`）的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 该项的 属性设置为上次更改文件系统上的文件的时间。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 如果 `ZipArchiveMode.Update` 存在，则项的大小限制仅限于 。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 此限制是因为更新模式在内部使用 以允许在更新存档时所需的查找，并且 的最大大小等于 int 的大小。This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有文件在 zip 存档中创建新条目，并指定压缩级别。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and specify the compression level. MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed

param.name: source
param.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

span.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

span.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

param.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

span.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建 `destinationDirectoryName`所指定的目录。This method creates the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName`. 如果目标目录已存在，则此方法不会覆盖它;它引发 异常。If the destination directory already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 方法还创建在 zip 存档中反映层次结构的子目录。The method also creates subdirectories that reflect the hierarchy in the zip archive. 如果在提取过程中出现错误，存档将保持部分提取。If an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件都具有与指定的目录的相对路径 `destinationDirectoryName`，因为其源条目必须是存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有文件在 zip 存档中创建新条目，并将存档提取到新目录。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the archive to a new directory. 若要编译器此代码示例，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression` 和 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);

summary.span: Extracts all of the files in the archive to a directory on the file system.

span.span: Extracts all of the files in the archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的目录可能已存在。The specified directory may already exist. 此方法将创建指定的目录和所有子目录（如有必要）。This method will create the specified directory and all subdirectories if necessary. 如果提取存档时出现错误，存档将保持部分提取。If there is an error while extracting the archive, the archive will remain partially extracted. 系统将提取每个条目，以便提取的文件与存档的根具有相同的 `destinationDirectoryName` 相对路径。Each entry will be extracted such that the extracted file has the same relative path to `destinationDirectoryName` as the entry has to the root of the archive. 如果要存档的文件具有无效的上次修改时间，则将使用 Zip 时间戳格式的第一个日期和时间（在1980年1月1日午夜）。If a file to be archived has an invalid last modified time, the first date and time representable in the Zip timestamp format (midnight on January 1, 1980) will be used.

summary.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件的上次写入时间被设置为最后一次更改 zip 存档中的条目的时间;此值存储在 属性中。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 不能使用此方法提取目录;请改用 方法。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何遍历 zip 存档文件的内容，并提取扩展名为 .txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file, and extract files that have a .txt extension. 它将覆盖目标文件夹中具有相同名称的现有文件。It overwrites an existing file that has the same name in the destination folder. 若要编译器此代码示例，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression` 和 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program2.vb#2)]
